response:
"wie kann man noch immer davon sprechen, dass die verarbeitung von personenbezogenen daten ein wichtiger bestandteil unseres täglichen lebens ist? haben wir uns aufgegeben, unsere privatsphäre zu schützen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #kritik"

translation: "how can we still talk about the processing of personal data being an important part of our daily lives? have we given up on protecting our privacy? #dataprotection #privacy #criticism"

in this post, i'm expressing my criticism towards the way personal data is being handled and processed in today's society. by using the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphäre (privacy), i'm highlighting the importance of protecting personal information and the need for more awareness and action towards preserving privacy. the use of the word "kritik" (criticism) emphasizes my opinion on the matter.
